Articles.Content:
> 
> I use an experimental .15 aircraft to bomb your asteroid to pieces.
> 
> My hill.

i go into the future and take a .16 rocket and bomb youre hill to shreds.

my hill.

I use the power of modding and create a supercapital ship made in one piece that tears the hill into 1 cm pieces, then disguises itself as the hill

My supercapital ship hill
Nobody noticed that I still have the faked hill I transported to the Mun...

I nuke Kreuzung and kill everyone else.

I build a hill made out of sentries.

My killy hill.

I send a spy and sap them all

My hill made out of metal chunks

I construct a faux hill on a hollywood set, and send everybody footage of me controlling it. Chaos ensues.

I enjoy the view from my rebuilt German cottage.

I rebuild my hill and cover it in titanium.

My hard-to-destroy hill.

I go to russia and get some nukes to bomb youre titanium hill.

my hill.

I use a giant space tether to steal your hill and then create a wormhole that destroys the system you were in.

MY LONELY HILL

I find the hill and buy it from you for 9999999999999999999 counterfeit dollars.

MY EXPENSIVE HILL.
My cheap police SWAT team. My prison hill just for you.

my EXPENSIVE swat team steals back the hill.

My new prison hill.

I throw in a few grenades.

My rubble hill.

I bring in a concrete truck and cobble the hill back together. Then I dump dirt all over it and plant grass. Then I clone the Death star 999999999999999999999999999999 times and go to the edge of the galaxy and watch the boom that happens when somebody tries to take it.

MY HILL.

I clone Luke Skywalker 999999999999999999999999999999 times, and unleash him among the Death Stars. Then I cobble the Death Star remains, and create a giant, unreachable hill.

My hill.

I make a spacecruiser and captuer it.

my captured hill.

I\'m Mirialan, so I know much more about Star Wars than you, giving me an easy way to break all your safety crap. My hill made of 999999999999999999999999999999 death stars, a space cruiser and some concrete.

I deconstruct all the atoms your hill is created of, and disperse them across the galaxy. I then create a new hill out of the four nearest stars and cool them to 25 degrees Celsius so they\'re not too hot to sit on. My cool stars 8)

As your stars cool down, they stop nuclear fusion and don\'t produce heat anymore, which cools them down to 0 Â°K.

I build a new hill on Kerbin.

I obliterate Kerbin for no apparent reason, leaving Niveus Res Publica.

My Roleplaying country in space
Anti-country missile silo integrated in my hill. My hill, your debris.
I peacefully go off and construct a new hill using the dirt floating around after the destruction of Niveus Res Publics. My new hill.

I oh-so-not peacefully use the entire Earth\'s nuclear arsenal to destroy your hill. I then build my own in Niveus.

My hill in Niveus Res Publica.

I make an unsafe rocket.

My hill.

I claim an asteroid as a hill.

My rock.
